Direct Energy Solar <http://www.directenergysolar.com>
A Special Message for Our Valued Customers
Spread the Word & Get Rewarded <http://www.directenergysolar.com/refer?utm_medium=od&utm_source=custrefer&utm_campaign=custreferq42015&utm_content=custreferv2>
We love referrals and reward our customers who spread the word about the benefits of going solar the right way with Direct Energy Solar.
Do you know someone who may benefit from going solar? As a Direct Energy Solar customer, you can earn a cash reward for any referral that switches to solar with Direct Energy Solar!
We've Increased Your Cash Reward(1) Was $500. Now $750. Extended from January 15 to February 29, 2016!
Your Friend Receives Our Current Monthly Offer Go to directenergysolar.com for details.
Make even more by hosting an Open House! Receive $750 from each sale from your Open House.(2) Contact Lindsey Williams at 443.239.9809 or email lindsey.williams@directenergysolar.com <mailto:lindsey.williams@directenergysolar.com> for more information.
Earn More Rewards for a Limited Time: <http://www.directenergysolar.com/refer?utm_medium=od&utm_source=custrefer&utm_campaign=custreferq42015&utm_content=custreferv2>
Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way. TM
(1)You must be a Direct Energy Solar customer to participate in the Direct Energy Solar Referral Program. For each referral who signs a contract with Direct Energy Solar between November 25, 2015–February 29, 2016, you will receive $750. This referral offer is not valid within special community pricing programs or in combination with any other offer—if your referral receives special community pricing on their solar contract, you will receive $200. Individuals may not refer themselves. Referrals must have no prior contact with Direct Energy Solar to be considered a customer referral. Payment in the form of a check is sent within 60 days of the sale.
(2)You will receive $750 for each referral who signs a contract with Direct Energy Solar, resulting from the open house, between November 25, 2015–February 29, 2016. There is no limit to the amount of contracts signed from your open house. This offer is not valid within special community pricing programs or in combination with any other offer—if your referral receives special community pricing on their solar contract, you will receive $200. Individuals may not refer themselves. Referrals must have no prior contact with Direct Energy Solar to be considered a customer referral. Payment in the form of a check is sent within 60 days of the sale. If the customer decides to cancel the open house, they will make every effort to provide Direct Energy Solar with at least four weeks notice. The customer agrees that a Direct Energy Solar sales/marketing representative will be onsite to answer questions for visitors.
Offers and financing are available to customers who qualify, vary by location, and are not available in all areas. We customize our solar power system specifically for your home, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. See terms and conditions for more details.
